properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, exit the Orange Line at Tufts Medical Center. Take the elevators to the street. At the street, cross Washington Street to take the Silver Line to Chinatown. Alternatively, if you are able, exit at Downtown Crossing and follow Washington Street one-quarter of a mile south to Boylston and Essex Streets. \nIf boarding, use Chinatown Elevator 922 and take the Forest Hills-bound train to Tufts Medical Center. At Tufts, switch to an Oak Grove-bound train.

Turn right and proceed to Haymarket Elevator 906 to reach the Green Line platform.

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If boarding/exiting the Green Line, use Haymarket Elevator 908 at the New Sudbury and New Chardon Streets entrance to enter the Green Line. If boarding/exiting the Orange Line, use Elevators 903 or 904 at the Congress Street entrance.

attributes.name: Oak Grove Elevator 800 (Busway, parking lot to lobby)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: Customers desiring elevator service to exit at Oak Grove must exit the train at Malden Center and see station personnel for further assistance. Customer desiring elevator service to enter the station should utilize the call box for further assistance. Alternatively, use Bus Routes 132, 136, or 137 to connect between Oak Grove and Malden Center.

properties.name: note
properties.value: Full high level platform is available to provide level boarding to every car in a train set

attributes.name: Massachusetts Avenue Elevator 852 (Platform to paid lobby)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, exit the Orange Line at Back Bay and see station personnel or use the call box to request assistance. If boarding, see station personnel or use the call box at Massachusetts Avenue to request assistance.

properties.name: fee-daily
properties.value: Weekdays - 30 min or less: $6, 1 hr: $10, 1.5 hrs: $15, 2 hrs: $20, 3 hrs: $25, 4 hrs: $28, over 4 hrs until 5 AM: $33. | Nights and Weekends - 30 min or less: $6, 1 hr: $10, 1.5 hrs: $15, over 1.5 hrs until 5 AM: $16

properties.name: fee-monthly
properties.value: Regular monthly: $340, North End resident: $150, Reverse commute (4 PM - 9 AM): $125

attributes.name: Downtown Crossing Elevator 869 (Alewife platform to Summer Street Concourse)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: To exit the Red Line nearby, remain on the Red Line and exit at Park Street using the center platform. Take Park Street Elevator 808 to the lobby, go straight, and travel down the Winter Street Concourse. Pass through the fare gates and take Downtown Crossing Elevator 892 to the street.\nTo board Alewife-bound Red Line service from Downtown Crossing, use Park Street Elevators 804 and 808 located at the corner of Winter and Tremont Street.

Downtown Crossing Elevator 870 (Ashmont/Braintree platform to Summer Street Concourse)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: To exit the Red Line nearby, exit the train at Park Street using the center platform. Take the Park Street Elevator 808 to the lobby, take a left, and travel down the Winter Street Concourse toward the Orange Line. Exit through the fare gates and take Downtown Crossing Elevator 892 to the street.\nTo access Ashmont/Braintree Red Line service, take an Alewife train one stop to Park Street and exit on the left to transfer to Ashmont/Braintree service.

attributes.name: Downtown Crossing Elevator 892 (Forest Hills platform to Washington Street, Winter Street)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, travel down the Winter Street Concourse. Take Park Street Elevator 804 on your left to the street. \nIf boarding, take Park Street Elevator 804 (located at the intersection of Winter Street and Tremont Street) down to the lobby. Take a right and travel down the Winter Street Concourse.

Haymarket Elevator 908 (Green Line lobby to busway, Sudbury Street, New Chardon Street)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting the Green Line, take elevator 906 down, then elevator 905 up, and elevator 904 to the exit.\nIf boarding use the Orange Line lobby at Congress Street.

attributes.name: North Station Elevator 911 (Oak Grove platform to paid lobby)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, take the Orange Line to Community College and return to North Station on a Forest Hills-bound train and exit using North Station Elevator 910. If boarding, use North Station Elevator 910 to board a Forest Hills-bound train. At Haymarket, switch to an Oak Grove-bound train. \nAlternatively, customers may exit at Haymarket, cross New Chardon Street, and travel three-tenths of a mile down Canal Street to North Station at Causeway Street.

attributes.name: State Elevator 974 (Bowdoin platform to Congress Street, State Street)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, go down the ramp to the Oak Grove platform. Turn left and take elevator 967 or 802 to the Wonderland platform. From the platform take elevator 975 to reach the street. \nIf boarding, cross State Street to use elevator 975 to the Wonderland platform. Take the ramp to the Bowdoin platform, the hallway to the Forest Hills platform, or elevators 967 or 802 to the Oak Grove platform.
